Ilse Klink (a mụrụ na 4 Machị 1972), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu na South Africa. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama Isidingo na Inkaba na Arendsvlei
A mụrụ ya na 4 Machị 1972, na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị BA Drama ya na Mahadum Pretoria Ọ bụ onye isi ojii mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri nke Mahadum Pretoria.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na Performing Arts Council nke Orange Free State
N'afọ 1999, a họpụtara ya maka ọrụ 'Vanessa Booysens' na ihe nkiri telivishọn Isidingo
Site na ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ onye a ma ama, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ 2007 ebe o mechara merie Avanti Award maka Best Actress in a Soapie n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 2012, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke Fashion Week CEO 'Miranda Simons' na Mzansi Magic telenovela Inkaba
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka Fiddler on the Roof, Maru, The Fantasticks, Blomtyd is Bloeityd, Slegs vir Almal, Amen Corner, Chicago, Rent na Menopause the Musical
O mere ọtụtụ ọrụ nkwado ndị agadi na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Tussen Duiwels, Molo Fish, Hagenheim Streng Privaat na Snitch 2.
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú, onye bụ onye isi egwu maka otu egwu egwu egwu nke Afrikaans 'Ekstra Dik'
Na ihe nkiri sinima, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Ellen: The Ellen Pakkies Story, Cold Harbour, Dis ek, Anna na Stroomop
Maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Stroomop, e mechara nye ya Golden Horn maka Best Supporting Actress na South African Film and Television Awards (SAFTA). nke afọ 2019.
N'afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka 'Tamara van Niekerk', onye nkuzi ịgba egwu na usoro telivishọn Roer Jou Voete
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2017, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ 'Adeole' na oge atọ nke ihe nkiri ụlọ mkpọrọ Mzansi Magic Lockdown
N'afọ 2020, ọ pụtara na usoro Arendsvlei maka oge nke atọ ya ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Dortothy Galant'.
